{{ p.id }} {{ p.nom }} {{ p.Prix }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductsService } from '../services/products.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.scss'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit { handleDeleteProduct(p: any) { let index = this.products.indexOf(p); this.products.splice(index,2) } products! : Array; constructor(private productsService : ProductsService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.productsService.getAllProducts().subscribe({ next : (data)=>{ this.products=data; } }); } }
